org.jgentleframework.integration.remoting
Class RemoteInvocationImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.jgentleframework.core.reflection.metadata.SerializableMetadataControl
      org.jgentleframework.integration.remoting.RemoteInvocationImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, SerializableMetadata, RemoteInvocation
public class RemoteInvocationImpl
extends SerializableMetadataControl
implements java.io.Serializable, RemoteInvocation

Represents an remote invocation implementation providing core method invocation properties in a serializable fashion.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
SerializableMetadataControl, RemoteInvocation, Serialized Form
